author: The Associated Press
title: Pope holds solitary Easter Mass, calls COVID-19 pandemic an 'epochal challenge'
description: Pope Francis called for solidarity the world over to confront the "epochal challenge" posed by the coronavirus pandemic, as Christians celebrated a solitary Easter Sunday, blending the joyful feast day with sorrow over the toll the virus has already taken.
content:
